channel.title: 360 Users - Halo 2 Maps ( Including Newest ones)
channel.description:
Here is all the New halo 2 Maps in Orignial state plus the Blastacular Map pack The files has a picture of what you should do, and you need to have
[url=http://us.codejunkies.com/shop/product.asp?c=US&cr=USD&cs=$&r=0&l=1&ProdID=712]Xport 360[/url]
Thats it Plus the Halo 2 Game
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=FY3PZ4I4]Download Here[/url]

item.title: 360 Users - Halo 2 Maps ( Including Newest ones)
item.dc:creator: @afi afi
item.description:
@afi wrote:

DeadBird:

I know you’re trying to help, but letting people buy them would be a better solution. The maps were made by a new company called “Certain Affinity” and buying these helps them get more resources. If they make enough, they’re going to make a megaton of Halo 3 maps later on.

These are just maps redone from halo 1 and besides in the next few months there going to be free anyway =\

Read full topic
